info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 4:32PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Catawba, Alexander, northwestern Iredell, southeastern Caldwell and southeastern Burke Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 431 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Boomer to 10 miles west of Hickory. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hickory, Newton, Taylorsville, St. Stephens, Conover, Longview, Bethlehem, Icard, Hildebran and Stony Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
